title: [Temple of Lorminstra, Courtyard]
description: Hidden from the public eye by the temple and high hedges, garden plots border the path beneath the night sky.  The pretext of perpetual winter has been allowed to lapse in this confined area where Lorminstra's servants engage in the more mundane activities of everyday life.

Hidden from the public eye by the temple and high hedges, a priestess wearing a coarse-woven, shorter version of her clerical garb labors in a garden plot to one side of the path.  The pretext of perpetual winter has been allowed to lapse in this confined area where Lorminstra's servants engage in the more mundane activities of everyday life.
